article: If you go to a supermarket and find that there is no cashiers , would you still pay for your things? People in our  _  are having a test of honesty now. The supermarket here has a special area. This area sells  _  things like pens and knives. People need to scan their things, and put the  _  into the cash desk all by themselves.  _  watches them. By now, the supermarket runs very  _  . People say they enjoy the feeling of being honest. Once I go to the supermarket to buy a note book. When I am ready to pay, I find I have no  _  on me. I am just going to put the note book  _  when a neighbour of mine sees me. He knows what my  problem  is. And he says he will be glad to  _  me five yuan. I thank him and pay the note book  _  the money. Do you think the supermarket is doing a great job? And will you be glad to pay when you are in such a supermarket?
